name: The Alchemist
description: A novel that tells the story of a shepherd boy named Santiago who travels from Spain to Egypt in search of a treasure.
author: Paulo Coelho

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: The story of a young girl, her father, and an unjust trial that rocks their town.
author: Harper Lee

name: The Great Gatsby
description: A story about the rise and fall of Jay Gatsby, set against the backdrop of the Roaring Twenties.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society where the government controls every aspect of citizens' lives.
author: George Orwell

name: The Hobbit
description: A children's fantasy novel about a hobbit on a quest
author: J. R. R. Tolkien

name: Pride and Prejudice
description: A romantic novel about the complicated relationships between members of the Bennet family.
author: Jane Austen
